name: Formula Retro Racing
overview: Featuring the fast and exciting gameplay that the genre is known for, Formula Retro Racing captures the essence of old school racing games with low poly graphics, a retro soundtrack and high speed action. This revival of the classic-arcade racer takes advantage of modern hardware with smooth high-frame rate visuals as well as improved car handling and physics. Race through a diverse range of tracks across multiple game modes and car classes to beat your personal best times and compete in the global online leaderboards! Features • Retro arcade-racing action • 8 unique tracks each with varying difficulty • Classic arcade checkpoint racing game mode • New ‘Eliminator’ game mode • High frame rate and retro visuals • Destructible cars with crazy crash physics • Best Lap and Race Time online leaderboards for each track • Up to 4 player split screen local multiplayer
